hero.title: Hello, I'm Jon Oyanguren
hero.description: Digital developer and entrepreneur specialized in creating impactful digital products while exploring the world as a digital nomad.
hero.name: Jon Oyanguren
hero.bio: Exploring the world while building digital products that make an impact. Combining the freedom of digital nomadism with the passion for creating.

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Curious, creative and lover of technology and freedom
about.description1: I am a digital developer and entrepreneur who has chosen the path of digital nomadism. My passion is to create digital products that add value while exploring different cultures and places in the world.
about.description2: As a solopreneur, I specialize in developing innovative and scalable web solutions, combining my technical expertise with a unique entrepreneurial vision shaped by my international experiences.

items.title: Fast Trip Planner
items.description: Web platform that uses AI to help you organize your vacations or any trip and budgets.

items.title: Citrus Designer
items.description: Web platform to hire design UX and UI by subscription. With dashboard for both client and designer.

items.title: Daily Content Limit
items.description: Chrome extension that limits the daily amount of short content you watch on YouTube, Instagram and TikTok.

contact.title: Contact
contact.subtitle: If you want to know more about any of my projects, you can contact me.
